::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus slams into a tree as missiles hit him, nearly going unconscious. He 
stands up in time to see DarkMouse dragged away. Stumbling forward, he fires 
a shot at Manterror before transforming into his less-damaged beast mode.

He looks around. All the maximals seem to have been dragged away. He swears, 
seeing Striker also transform into his beast mode.

The two maximals turn and run into the bushes, heading back for the Ark.
